|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== * Product Segment: AC1200 (867+300 Mbps) * Antenna: 2x external detachable antennas * Operating Frequency: 2.4/5 GHz * Power Supply: external adapter : AC Input: 110~240V (50/60Hz) : DC Output: 12V with max. 1A current * Dimensions: 189 x 129 x 36 mm (WxDxH) ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62022-86#3003 On '''iXBT''' forums] (''{{TPFirmware|Padavan}}, RTN'' posts) :ASUS RT-AC54U = [[ASUS RT-N54U]] + 2T2R 802.11ac !! ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-ac54u |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/asus/rt-ac54u |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7620 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Notes== === [https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/blob/master/release/src/router/rc/sysdeps/init-ralink.c RMerlin's Github] === {{SCollapse|config â€¢ >> |
		case MODEL_RTN11P:	/* fall through */
		case MODEL_RTN14U:	/* fall through */
		case MODEL_RTN54U:      /* fall through */
		case MODEL_RTAC54U:      /* fall through */
		case MODEL_RTN56UB1:      /* fall through */
		case MODEL_RTAC1200HP:  /* fall through */
		case MODEL_RTAC51U:	/* fall through */
		case MODEL_RTAC52U
}} ==See also== *[[List of Padavan firmware supported devices]] *[http://www.asus.com/event/2014/network/ASUS_AC_family_chart/solutions.html Asus Wireless AC networking solutions] [[Category:English Documentation]]
